name: Nessie 64 - Virtual Pet Jam
description:
Description

Nessie 64 is an N64 styled prototype for a horror/pet simulator.  Candidates are chosen to entertain and feed Nessie until they inevitably meet their terrible fate. Apply today!

This game was created in roughly three weeks for the Virtual Pet Jam 2022.

CONTROLS

PETHOLD LEFT MOUSETOSS FOODRIGHT MOUSECENTER CAMMIDDLE MOUSETOGGLE CAM ZOOMQWHISTLE/CALLEMENU ESC/START

*If Nessie gets stuck you can press spacebar + 0 (zero) to force an unstuck call. This can be very buggy so only use it you really need it.*

You can contact me on twitter : @MothInteractive
